zo 04 okt 2009
T-DOSE

Ludovic Dubost
Next-Gen Wikis, Mixing Content-Oriented Applications with Wikis

T-DOSE
Its a free and yearly event held in The Netherlands to promote use and development of Open Source Software. During this event Open Source projects, developers and visitors can exchange ideas and knowledge, at the Fontys University of Applied Science in Eindhoven.
title: T-DOSE 2009 Open Source, Ludovic Dubost, Next-Gen Wikis, Mixing Content-Oriented Apps with Wikis
